IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact__r.AB_Salutation__c , "")=False && ISBLANK(Contact__r.AB_Middle_Name__c )=False ,TEXT(Contact__r.AB_Salutation__c)&" "& Contact__r.AB_First_Name__c &" "&Contact__r.AB_Middle_Name__c,
IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact__r.AB_Salutation__c, "")=False && ISBLANK(Contact__r.AB_Middle_Name__c)=True ,TEXT(Contact__r.AB_Salutation__c)&" "&Contact__r.AB_First_Name__c,

,Contact__r.AB_First_Name__c)))
&" "&
IF( ISBLANK( Contact__r.AB_Suffix__c )=False ,Contact__r.AB_Last_Name__c &", "&Contact__r.AB_Suffix__c
,Contact__r.AB_Last_Name__c)
CustomField.label: AB Full Name
